physical_appearance:\This plan is rectangular in shape and it is encased in a black frame. The scale used to represent the map is not indicated. The title of the plan
 \\Plan of Singapore Shewing the Proposed Harbour Improvements
subject_terms_1:the Routes of the Proposed Electric Tramways \u0026 Proposed Railway Extension to Wharves 1904\\ wharves railroads (infrastructure) streetcar systems reclamation development (function)
subject_terms_2:is stated at the bottom right hand corner. To the left of the title of the plan Harbours Wharves Railroads Street-railroads Reclamation of land
subject_terms_3:\\Notes\\ show the legend and different colours used to represent the railway and tramway routes. Below the title of the plan Harbours Wharves Rail transport
subject_terms_4:it states \\Published by Fraser \u0026 Neave Limited.
context_1:Singapore\\ and \\Drawn and lithographed by W \u0026 A.K. Johnston Limited
context_2:Edinburg \u0026 London\\. There are red and blue plain and dotted lines present on the map. The names of several buildings
context_3:locations
context_4:and names of harbours can be seen on the plan as well.\
context_5:harbours
context_6:Singapore Maps
context_7:Port development

metadata.creator_2: Fraser & Neave Ltd, Singapore W & A.K. Johnston Limited, Edinburg & London.
metadata.creator_1: Fraser & Neave Ltd. W. & A.K. Johnston Limited
metadata.physical_appearance: "This plan is rectangular in shape and it is encased in a black frame. The scale used to represent the map is not indicated. The title of the plan, ""Plan of Singapore Shewing the Proposed Harbour Improvements
metadata.subject_terms_1: the Routes of the Proposed Electric Tramways & Proposed Railway Extension to Wharves 1904"" wharves railroads (infrastructure) streetcar systems reclamation development (function)
metadata.subject_terms_2: is stated at the bottom right hand corner. To the left of the title of the plan Harbours Wharves Railroads Street-railroads Reclamation of land
metadata.subject_terms_3: ""Notes"" show the legend and different colours used to represent the railway and tramway routes. Below the title of the plan Harbours Wharves Rail transport
metadata.subject_terms_4: it states ""Published by Fraser & Neave Limited.
metadata.context_1: Singapore"" and ""Drawn and lithographed by W & A.K. Johnston Limited
metadata.context_2: Edinburg & London"". There are red and blue plain and dotted lines present on the map. The names of several buildings
metadata.context_4: and names of harbours can be seen on the plan as well."
